verses.verse: A songe of the steares. I Will lyft vp myne eyes vnto the hylles, from whence commeth my helpe?
My helpe commeth euen from the Lorde, which hath made heauen and earth.
He wyll not suffre thy fote to be moued, and he that kepeth the, wyll not slepe.
Beholde, he that kepeth Israel, shall nether slombre nor slepe.
The Lorde hym selfe is thy keper, the Lorde is thy defence vpon thy ryght hande.
So that the sunne shall not burne the by daye, nether the moone by nyght.
The Lorde shall preserue the from all euell, yee it is euen he that shall kepe thy soule.
The Lorde shall preserue thy goynge out and thy commynge in, from thys tyme forth for euer more.
